official.headline: Order Restored
official.anchor_line: Returned citizens resume daily life, reflecting sustained progress in city management.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s Behavioral Compliance Index ensures a harmonious community, swiftly guiding residents back into productive routines.

official.headline: Citizens Aligned
official.anchor_line: Recent assessments show record-high compliance scores across diverse neighborhoods.
official.contextual_reframing: The BCI, Stenograd’s advanced real-time monitoring system, guarantees continued trust and opportunity for model citizens.

official.headline: Community Harmony
official.anchor_line: Families celebrate consistency as restored loved ones integrate seamlessly with improved routines.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent data-driven governance delivers stability for all, strengthening social bonds and personal well-being in Stenograd.

underground.headline: Ghosts Return Home
underground.anchor_line: Vanished neighbors reappear, acting perfect—but who are they now?
underground.contextual_reframing: Stenograd's BCI—the Behavioral Compliance Index—now rewrites people. Faces are familiar, but memories and stories don’t match. If your loved one changes overnight, ask why.

underground.headline: Silent Histories Edited
underground.anchor_line: Reports of missing years: citizens with erased pasts and pristine records.
underground.contextual_reframing: Restored records look flawless, yet old friends whisper about glitches in identity. If you remember different, speak up before the system erases you too.

underground.headline: Council Stays Quiet
underground.anchor_line: The bosses in charge dodge questions, blaming 'system updates.'
underground.contextual_reframing: No official dares explain the new uniformity. Power hides behind data, while real stories get scrubbed from Stenograd's digital memory.
